summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5628 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 2 and 5, University Place Addition, and in Block 2, College Addition, being the alleys between 21st Avenue Northeast and 22nd Avenue Northeast, from East 62nd Street to East 65th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74303 as amended by Ordinance No. 74357, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
